settings.title: It Started With A Polo
settings.text: Back in 2013, we set out to make a better golf shirt, one that performed on the course and looked and felt great off the course, too.

settings.subtitle: At the time, the market was saturated with slick synthetics and sticky double-mercerized cotton, and neither was very comfortable. So, we took matters into our own hands and did things differently. We introduced a superior raw material—naturally breathable, ultra-soft, organic long-staple Peruvian Pima cotton (the best of the best)—and kept the details clean and simple.

The result was a classic, no-fuss polo that got softer with wear. It was the anti-golf shirt of its time, but it breathed, wicked sweat and felt better than anything else out there. Golfers took notice. Non-golfers took notice. And so B. Draddy was born.

settings.title: All In The Family
settings.text:
Family history forms the DNA of B. Draddy, and above everything, the bond of brotherhood inspires all that we do, from our product line to our partnerships. Brotherhood, if not the strongest relationship one can experience in life, is a close second. A brother is a rival, a protector, a confidante—it’s a bond you can’t shake, even if you try. 

My first experience with brotherhood came from my great uncles, my grandfather’s three brothers who stepped up as father figures to my dad, and later to myself and my siblings. In a similar selfless fashion, my own brother has been a spine of support who has provided friendship, guidance and stability over the course of our lives. And as a dad to four boys, my heart swells with pride as I witness the bond my sons have formed in a fraction of the years. It’s a bond that inspires them to take on the playground bully by day and pile into the same bedroom at night. It’s a bond that has them already, even in childhood, completely dedicated to one another without question.

Representing the third generation of Draddys in sportswear, I’ve made it my mission to carry forth a legacy of excellence and a drive to push further. It’s with the strength, support and inspiration of brotherhood that we bring you B. Draddy. Handsome, comfortable, innovative, well-made.
